short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide Youtube thumbnails and titles to avoid distractions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of getting sucked into spending hours in the YouTube rabbit hole?

FocusTube lets you hide:
- thumbnails
- comments
- end screen feed
- shorts
...so you can focus on what matters!

Simply toggle it off to temporarily turn off hiding.

You can use it to hide spoilers, blur distractions while working, or block YouTube thumbnails while teaching.

PRIVACY
Requires the "storage" permission to store your settings.
